contents.label: Str

contents.label: Mag

contents.tooltip: Base Damage for Martial attacks. Already applied in Weapon Table
Base Damage for Magic attacks. Already applied in Weapon Table
Agility of Current Weapon + Terrain Bonuses

rowLayout.rollMessage:
Attacks ${getPropertyDataFromActor("target", "class")}$ with ${item.wpname}$:
${roll:= [1d100]}$ TN: ${tnbase:=70+fetchFromDynamicTable('ratingnums', 'dytdexvalue', 'dytrating', dex)+item.hit}$ - ${avoid:= getPropertyDataFromActor("target", "avo",0)}$ = (${finaltn:= first(tnbase)-avoid}$)
${roll <= finaltn ? 'Hit!' : 'Miss...'}$

contents.suffix: When you have weapon advantage, initiate combat, and deal damage, Target becomes broken!
